question.title: j.l.IllegalStateException: No Scope registered for scope name 'refresh'
question.body:
I'm trying to use @RefreshScope at @Service layer to dynamically change the value of a property.My application successful started, however after make a request then getting this error

j.l.IllegalStateException: No Scope registered for scope name 'refresh'
    at o.s.b.f.s.AbstractBeanFactory.doGetBean(AbstractBeanFactory.java:359)
    at o.s.b.f.s.AbstractBeanFactory.getBean(AbstractBeanFactory.java:200)
    at o.s.a.t.SimpleBeanTargetSource.getTarget(SimpleBeanTargetSource.java:35)
    at o.s.a.f.CglibAopProxy$DynamicAdvisedInterceptor.intercept(CglibAopProxy.java:692)
    at

Could someone help me with this issue?
